card_subtitle: Our soft fabrics are distinguished not only by their appearance, but also by their high-quality construction. Soft yet durable fabrics are comfortable for everyday use and retain their softness for a long time. A perfect choice to make your home interior more pleasant and stylish.
sofatext3: Nam Impex production company has been operating for many years and has become a favorite brand of our people.
aboutus_title: Namimpeks-Textile is one of the new companies specializing in the production of modern textile products. Continuing to work in line with the company's shipping operations by following innovative manufacturing and high quality standards. The company produces a wide range of clothing fabrics, household textile products and specially designed products.
aboutus_text: The main directions of activity of Namimpeks-Textile include:  Fabrics Production: Production of high quality fabrics in various types and texture options.  Design And Innovation: Follow trends and create exclusive designs that meet customer requirements. Stainability And Ecology: Implementation of sustainable production by following the principles of environmental protection.
